publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3132 Mr Andrew Arbuckle: Support Local Produceâ€”That the Parliament supports the development of locally produced food and drink across Scotland; further supports initiatives designed to increase publicity about local produce; agrees that our rural communities deserve the right to flourish and prosper and that local produce is good for local economies, businesses and for the community, and notes the efforts of the European LEADER+ initiative in creating community-led rural projects throughout the country and in producing the new Loch Lomond and rural Stirling "Buy Local" food and drink directory.
S2M-3132 Support Local Produce (lodged on 28 July 2005) Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mike Rumbles*, Mike Pringle*, Bruce Crawford*, Mark Ballard*, Ms Sandra White*, Iain Smith*, Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-3132 Support Local Produce (lodged on 28 July 2005) Mr Bruce McFee*, Rob Gibson*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Shiona Baird*, Eleanor Scott*
S2M-3132 Support Local Produce (lodged on 28 July 2005) Mr Mark Ruskell*
S2M-3132 Support Local Produce (lodged on 28 July 2005) Trish Godman*, Donald Gorrie*
